description: Current audit and accountability policy document, including version history and approval records
Current audit and accountability procedures document, including version history and last review date
Documentation of designated official responsible for managing audit and accountability policy and procedures
List of auditable event types configured across all system components (network, data storage, and computing devices)
Audit configuration documentation showing event types selected for continuous logging
Rationale document explaining why selected event types are adequate for after-the-fact investigations
Sample audit records demonstrating inclusion of required content (event type, timestamp, location, source, outcome, and identity)
Audit log storage capacity allocation documentation and retention requirements
Audit logging process failure alert configuration and recipient list
Documentation of audit storage capacity warning thresholds (75% or one month before impact) and alert recipients
Real-time alert configuration for audit failure events, including recipient roles with authority to address failures
Evidence of weekly audit record review and analysis activities for the past quarter
Audit review findings reports and documentation of reporting to designated personnel
Documentation of automated mechanisms used for audit record review, analysis, and reporting integration
Evidence of audit record correlation across different repositories for organization-wide situational awareness
Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) tool configuration for centralized audit record review and analysis
Documentation of integrated analysis combining audit records with vulnerability scanning, performance data, system monitoring, and penetration test data
Evidence of correlation between audit records and physical access monitoring information
Access control matrix showing permitted actions (read, write, execute, append, delete) for audit record information by role and user
Audit record reduction and report generation tool documentation and sample customizable reports
Configuration of automated audit record processing, sorting, and searching capabilities
Time synchronization configuration showing one-second granularity and use of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
Access controls and alert configuration for unauthorized access, modification, or deletion of audit information
Evidence of weekly storage of audit records in a physically separate repository from audited systems
Cryptographic mechanisms documentation for protecting integrity of audit information and audit tools (FIPS-validated)
List of privileged users or roles authorized to manage audit logging functionality
Non-repudiation mechanisms documentation covering addition, modification, deletion, approval, sending, and receiving of data
Audit record retention policy and evidence of compliance with M-21-31 and NARA requirements (minimum 90 days online, long-term offline)
System-wide audit trail compilation documentation showing time-correlated records from all network, data storage, and computing devices
Role-based audit configuration change procedures and documentation of authorized individuals with audit configuration responsibilities
